item.title: Connect to RDS database with STS from ROSA
item.description: The Amazon Web Services Relational Database Service (AWS RDS) can be consumed from Red Hat OpenShift Service on AWS (ROSA) and authenticate to DB with Security Token Service (STS). This is a guide to quickly connect to RDS Database (Postgres engine) from ROSA. Amazon Web Services Relational Database Service Amazon Web Services Relational Database Service (AWS RDS) is a distributed relational database service by Amazon Web Services. It is designed to simplify setup, operation, and scaling of a relational database for use in applications.
